quizQuestion.question: If an initiative is planned by TCS to help contract staff improve their conversational English skills, what would be your response

In a slum area near my apartment complex, lots of small children are involved in manufacturing of incense sticks and is brought to my notice by my brother.  I. I will not be bothered as it is not relevant/related to me. II. I will visit the area to understand the reason/cause. III. I will speak with the owner of manufacturing unit on the importance of education. IV. I will be concerned. But, the slum area is dirty and I won't go there as I may fall sick. V. I will alert the government helpline on Child labor about the same. Please select the actions you feel are relevant to the above scenario.
What do you feel when you see children begging on streets
